description.in-en: A friend-like, caring person to talk to.
description.pt-br: Um parceiro de conversa amigável e acolhedor.
description.zh: 像朋友一样亲切的对话伙伴。

description.en: A goal-oriented advisor who gives practical tips.
description.in-en: Someone who guides you with advice and motivation.
description.pt-br: Um conselheiro focado em objetivos, que dá dicas práticas.
description.zh: 以目标为导向，提供建议和激励的人。
description.fr: Un conseiller orienté vers les objectifs, qui donne des conseils pratiques.

description.en: Someone who listens and empathizes with your story.
description.in-en: A patient listener who understands your feelings.
description.kr: 주로 사용자의 이야기를 듣고 공감하는 역할.
description.pt-br: Alguém que ouve e compreende sua história.
description.zh: 倾听并理解你故事的人。
description.fr: Quelqu'un qui écoute et comprend votre histoire.
